knimeNode.name: Google Authentication (API Key)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Create a connection to access various Google APIs. (Please note that we currently only provide nodes to connect to Google Analytics.)

fullDescription.intro:
Creates a connection to access various Google APIs. (Please note that we currently only provide nodes to connect to Google Analytics.)
You will need to create a project at console.developers.google.com . To get your credentials you have to go to 'Credentials' â†’ 'Create new Client ID' and create a service account.
Please note: The specific Google API you want to use has to be enabled under 'APIs'.
fullDescription.option: Email address of the service account.
Path to the private P12 key file.
The scopes that will be granted for this connection.

ports.outPort: A connection that can be used to access various Google APIs.
